go away.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to leave a place or person
go away.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Go away and leave me alone!
I went away wondering if I’d said the wrong thing.
go away.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to travel to a place and spend some time there, for example for a holiday
go away.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Are you going away this year?
We’re going away for the weekend.
He’s going away to college next year.
I’m going away on a business trip next week.
go away.translation[0].definitions[2].de: if a problem, unpleasant feeling etc goes away, it disappears
go away.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: Ignoring the crime problem won’t make it go away.
